definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bear a grudge, cherish animosity, against (NH [[שָׂטַם]] Niph., Targum Ge 27:41 [[שְׂטַם]]; perh. akin to [[שׂטן]] q.v.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּשְׁטׂם]] Ge 27:41, 3 mpl. sf. [[יִשְׂטְמוּנִי]] Ps 55:4, etc.;—cherish animosity against, acc. pers. Ge 27:41 (J), Ge 49:23 (poem in J), Ge 50:15 (E), + [[בְּאַף]] Ps 55:4; of ´[[י]]:’s persistent assaults on Job, Job 16:9, Job 30:21.
